wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edward Hamilton Westrow Hulse, 7th Baronet (31 August 1889 – 12 March 1915) was an officer in the British Army during the First World War. He had his letters published posthumously detailing his account of the fighting on the Western Front, describing events such as the Christmas Truce.

response: *Sir Edward Hulse, 7th Baronet (1889–1915), British Army officer
